00014 // Session
00015 class Session : public data::Session {
00016 public:
00017     using base_type = data::Session;
00018     using key_type = decltype(base_type().session_id());
00019 
00020 public:
00021     bool Serialize(void *buf, size_t buflen, size_t &uselen) const;
00022     bool UnSerialize(void *buf, size_t buflen, size_t &uselen);
00023     void AfterUnSerialize() { }
00024     size_t GetSize() const { return base_type::ByteSize(); }
00025     key_type GetKey() const { return base_type::session_id(); }
00026     std::string ToString() const;
00027     char const* GetType() const;
00028 
00029 public:
00030     data::DBHandle&  GetDBHandle()  { return *base_type::mutable_db_handles(base_type::db_process_index()); }
00031     data::RobotData& GetRobotData() { return *GetDBHandle().mutable_data()->mutable_robot_data();           }
00032     bool  IsIndexValid(size_t index) { return index < (size_t)base_type::db_handles_size(); }
00033 };
00034 
00036 // SessionManager
00037 class SessionManager : public BasicManager<Session>, public lsf::basic::Singleton<SessionManager> {
00038 public:
00039     using base_type = BasicManager<Session>;
00040     static const size_t MAX_SESSION_ID = 0xffffff;
00041     static const size_t DEF_SESSION_LEAK_TIME = 300*1000; // milli time
00042     static const size_t DEF_SESSION_LEAK_CHECK_INTERVAL = 30*1000; // milli time
00043 
00044 public:
00045     bool Init(key_t shm_key, uint32_t max_size);
00046     Session* CreateSession();
00047     Session* GetSession(uint32_t session_id);
00048     void ReleaseSession(uint32_t session_id);
00049 
00050 private:
00051     uint32_t _cur_max_id;
00052 };
